title: Assassins Creed Liberation HD - Black Box
description:
Assassin's Creed Liberation HD by Black Box for PC.

The year is 1765. While the American Revolution rages in Boston and New York, Spanish forces in the South plot to seize control of Louisiana for the Templars. Change from disguise to disguise, assaulting your opponents directly as an Assassin, charming foes into vicious traps as a lady, or impersonating a slave to incite a riot to elude your pursuers.

How to install: Install .NET 4.5 with the installer, run Setup.exe, start the game from desktop, play the game!
